alert.note: Alert for Fayette Ridges; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 01 at 10:03AM EDT until April 02 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Higher Elevations of Fayette, Higher Elevations of Westmoreland, and Higher Elevations of Indiana Counties. In West Virginia, Eastern Preston, Eastern Tucker, Preston, Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston, and Western Tucker Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Fayette Ridges; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Westmoreland Ridges
